description.value:
Custodians of groves and gardens frequent tended greenery and farmlands cared for by loving stewards. These apparitions are drawn to peaceful pursuits, study, and quiet reflection. Some linger in the mortal realms not because they have lost their way, but because they believe they have already found Elysium. Custodians of groves and gardens are peaceful, quiet, and averse to conflict.

Apparition Skills

Farming Lore, Herbalism Lore

Apparition Spells

Cantrip @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.uZK2BYzPnxUBnDjr]{Tangle Vine}; 1st @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.MMIPT6jfwHfLPkm5]{Wall of Shrubs}; 2nd @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.C0D2eqzTAhiKm4j9]{Gentle Breeze}; 3rd @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.IFuEzfmmWyNwVbhY]{Safe Passage}; 4th @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.FHfrCABOmGVaEpPx]{Life-Draining Roots}; 5th @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.VDK5cQ94BszDrMiJ]{Entwined Roots}; 6th @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.x5rGOmhDRDVQPrnW]{Field of Life}; 7th @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.smiVuoFMSgY2FTOO]{Dancing Fountain}; 8th @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.4MOew29Z1oCX8O28]{Moment of Renewal}; 9th @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.fkDeKktdmbeplYRY]{Overwhelming Presence}

Vessel Spell

@Compendium[pf2e-playtest-data.war-of-immortals-playtest-spells.d6ZtbQMPOcaYPIAV]{Garden of Healing}

Avatar

Elysian Field Speed 60 feet, ignore difficult terrain and greater difficult terrain;

Melee 1 garden's cradle (agile, nonlethal, reach 10 feet, trip), Damage 6d6+6 bludgeoning plus Grab;

Ranged 1 impose peace (nonlethal, range 120 feet), Damage 6d6+6 mental
